column4: My friend just installed updates he had waiting on ibex. He said there were some errors.  He doesn't remember what the errors were. The system was acting "weird" so he restarted and now when he logs in he has no panels no Alt+F2 run dialog but shows his start up scripts and deesktop backgournd.  This behavior also happens if he trys gnome failsafe?
no failsafe is a terminal prompt for fixing things.. irssi is a terminal irc client..
no gnome failsafe session is completely different then recover console.
ah.. I was mixing them up.. sorry..
